title: October 17, 2019: Zilliqa (ZIL): Down 0.27%; 3rd Consecutive Down Day
text:
Zilliqa: What’s the Latest Regarding its Price?

Zilliqa’s current price, at the time of this writing, is $0.005195 USD, down by approximately 0.27% from the day prior. This marked the the 3rd straight day Zilliqa has been down; it is still in a unclear trend, and is currently 5.72% below its 20 day moving average; staying above this level may be critical to sustain short-term momentum. Traders looking for a range to trade within may wish to note that the Bollinger bands (a price indicator based on recent momentum and volatility) for Zilliqa imply the currency may oscillate between $0.004904 and $0.006116, based on how price has behaved in the two weeks prior. As we are closer to the bottom of that range, rangebound traders may wish to consider exploring buying opportunities.

Trade Zilliqa (ZIL) and over 500 other cryptos across ten different exchanges — all from one app. Try Quadency.

As for Zilliqa’s market cap, it is currently at about $45M US dollars.

Straight Off the Chain

42 transactions amongst holders of Zilliqa occurred yesterday. In terms of estimating the number of holders, over the past day the total number of wallets holding Zilliqa has gone up by approximately 7. To provide context, we’d rank this token as 31 out of the 34 Ethereum tokens in our index based on percentage growth in engagement over the past 7 days.

Observing Zilliqa’s Richest Wallets

Of the coin’s total money supply, the richest 1,0000 wallets currently own 98.28%. If we focus on exchanges, which may be an correlated with liquidity and greater confidence in the currency, the exchange wallets that are in the top 1,000 wallets own 10.04% of the currency’s total money supply. In terms of growth rates, the share of total supply of the richest 1,000 wallets has grown by 0% over the past week. For the exchange wallets within the richest 1,000 wallets, their share has grown by 0.19%.

How Much Development is Occurring?

In terms of how active the software development team working on Zilliqa is, it may be worth observing that the last time any work pertaining to code was done on their GitHub code repository was on October 17, 2019 (today). Over the past 30 days, we’ve seen open issues across Zilliqa’s GitHub repositories grow by 0.17 per day on average, while the number of watchers has grown by 0.77.

The Latest on Zilliqa and Social Media

If you are interested in following Zilliqa on social media, Twitter, where it has 66,309 following it, may be a good place to start. You can follow Zilliqa on Twitter here.

Where to Buy

You can trade Zilliqa, listed under the symbol ZIL, through the following exchanges: Gate, Yobit, Binance, DDEX, Ethfinex.

Article by SixJupiter
